title: How to Log Into Animal Jam

steps.headline: Open the Animal Jam website.
steps.description: Go to https://www.animaljam.com/welcome in your computer's browser.

steps.headline: Click PLAY NOW.
steps.description: It's a green button at the bottom of the page. This will open up the login page.

steps.headline: Click CREATE AN ANIMAL.
steps.description: This green button is in the middle of the page.

steps.headline: Select a type of animal.
steps.description: Click the type of animal (for example, a wolf) that you want to use.

steps.headline: Click NEXT.
steps.description: It's a green button in the bottom-right side of the page.

steps.headline: Select a name.
steps.description: Use the dials to select each part of your in-game name.

steps.headline: Click NEXT.
steps.description: It's a green button in the lower-right side of the page.

steps.headline: Enter your account information.
steps.description:
You'll need to select the following information:
Your gender
Your age
Your preferred Animal Jam username
If you choose a username that's already taken, you'll be asked to pick a different username. Your preferred Animal Jam password
If your password is too easy to guess like "password" or "animaljam", you'll be asked to change it. If your password has your username in it, you'll be asked to change it. You'll also have to edit your password if it's under 6 characters long.

steps.headline: Click NEXT.
steps.description: It's a green button in the bottom-right side of the page.

steps.headline: Enter your parent's email address.
steps.description: In the upper-right side of the login page, type in the email address of a parent or guardian.

steps.headline: Click I Agree.
steps.description: It's a green button in the lower-right side of the page. This will send an activation email to your parent. You won't be able to sign into your Animal Jam account until your parent activates your account for you.

steps.headline: Have your parent activate your account for you.
steps.description:
They can activate your account by doing the following:
Open the email from Animal Jam. Click the green Activate! link. Create a password and enter it in the "Password" and "Confirm" text boxes. Check the "I consent" box. Click ACTIVATE

steps.headline: Log into your Animal Jam account.
steps.description: Now that you have an activated Animal Jam account, you can log into it by using your username and password.

steps.headline: Open the Animal Jam website.
steps.description: Go to https://www.animaljam.com/welcome in your computer's browser.

steps.headline: Click PLAY NOW.
steps.description: It's a green button at the bottom of the page. This will open up the login page.

steps.headline: Type in your username.
steps.description: Type your username into the "Username" text box that's below the "PLAYER LOGIN" section of the login page. If you don't have an Animal Jam account, you can create one for free in order to get a username.

steps.headline: Enter your account password.
steps.description: Type the password that you use to log into your account into the "Password" text box that's below the "Username" text box.

steps.headline: Click SUBMIT.
steps.description: This green button is at the bottom of the login page. As long as your username and password match up, you'll log in without a problem.

text:
Creating an Account Open the Animal Jam website. Go to https://www.animaljam.com/welcome in your computer's browser. Click PLAY NOW. It's a green button at the bottom of the page. This will open up the login page. Click CREATE AN ANIMAL. This green button is in the middle of the page. Select a type of animal. Click the type of animal (for example, a wolf) that you want to use. Click NEXT. It's a green button in the bottom-right side of the page. Select a name. Use the dials to select each part of your in-game name. Click NEXT. It's a green button in the lower-right side of the page. Enter your account information. You'll need to select the following information:
Your gender
Your age
Your preferred Animal Jam username
If you choose a username that's already taken, you'll be asked to pick a different username. Your preferred Animal Jam password
If your password is too easy to guess like "password" or "animaljam", you'll be asked to change it. If your password has your username in it, you'll be asked to change it. You'll also have to edit your password if it's under 6 characters long. Click NEXT. It's a green button in the bottom-right side of the page. Enter your parent's email address. In the upper-right side of the login page, type in the email address of a parent or guardian. Click I Agree. It's a green button in the lower-right side of the page. This will send an activation email to your parent. You won't be able to sign into your Animal Jam account until your parent activates your account for you. Have your parent activate your account for you. They can activate your account by doing the following:
Open the email from Animal Jam. Click the green Activate! link. Create a password and enter it in the "Password" and "Confirm" text boxes. Check the "I consent" box. Click ACTIVATE Log into your Animal Jam account. Now that you have an activated Animal Jam account, you can log into it by using your username and password. Logging In Open the Animal Jam website. Go to https://www.animaljam.com/welcome in your computer's browser. Click PLAY NOW. It's a green button at the bottom of the page. This will open up the login page. Type in your username. Type your username into the "Username" text box that's below the "PLAYER LOGIN" section of the login page. If you don't have an Animal Jam account, you can create one for free in order to get a username. Enter your account password. Type the password that you use to log into your account into the "Password" text box that's below the "Username" text box. Click SUBMIT. This green button is at the bottom of the login page. As long as your username and password match up, you'll log in without a problem.
